document.full_text: south africa's anc was poised to sweep to victory in local elections but gains by the main opposition da indicate growing anger at the ruling party, which has been in power since apartheid ended 17 years ago.
document.title: anc wins south africa local polls
lines_and_colors: south africa's anc was poised to sweep to victory in local elections but gains by the main opposition da indicate growing anger at the ruling party, which has been in power since apartheid ended 17 years ago.
